Text: Prachetasa is considered to be one of the most mysterious figures of Hindu mythology.

Triplets:<Prachetasa
2:
<Text: Prachethasa:  According to the puranas Prachetasa was one of the 10 Prajapatis who were ancient sages and law gives.>
Triplets:<Prachethasa
3:
--------------------
Text: Prachethasa:  But there is also a reference to 10 Prachetas who were sons of Prachinabarthis and great grandsons of Prithu.

Triplets:<Prachetas
6:
--------------------
Text: Prachethasa:  Daksha was their son.
Triplets:<Prachethasa
8:
--------------------
Text: Prachethasa:  Soma was born from Marichi.
Triplets:<Prachethasa
9:
--------------------
<Text: Prachethasa:  But it is also said that Daksha was also the son of a woman called Marichi.>
Triplets:<Prachethasa
Daksha was also the son of a woman
10:
--------------------
Text: Prachethasa:  Marichi is again referred to as the mother of Daksha.
Triplets:<Marichi
11:
Text: Prachethasa:
Thus it appears that Prachetasas were Daksha’s fathers as well as Daksha’s great grandsons.
Triplets:<Prachethasa
12:
--------------------
<Text: Prachethasa:  This confusion arises in Hindu families essentially because children are often named after their grandfather or great grandfather.>
